name: saepbi-api
description: API REST para consultar datos de SAEPBI

scripts.build: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (!(Test-Path 'dist')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'dist' | Out-Null }; Copy-Item -LiteralPath 'index.js' -Destination 'dist' -Force; Copy-Item -LiteralPath 'package.json' -Destination 'dist' -Force; if (Test-Path 'package-lock.json') { Copy-Item -LiteralPath 'package-lock.json' -Destination 'dist' -Force }; if (Test-Path '.env') { Copy-Item -LiteralPath '.env' -Destination 'dist' -Force }"
